episodes.name: Aftermath
episodes.overview: Cate travels to Japan to get answers about her father and uncovers a shocking secret. Keiko, Lee, and Billy pursue a theory about Titans.

episodes.name: Departure
episodes.overview: Monarch closes in on Cate, Kentaro, and May as they try to track down a key individual. Keiko, Lee, and Billy stumble on a major find.

episodes.name: Secrets and Lies
episodes.overview: Shaw leads the team on a dangerous mission to Alaska in search of Hiroshi. Keiko, Lee, and Billy present their findings to General Puckett.

episodes.name: Parallels and Interiors
episodes.overview: The team is left stranded in the frozen tundra after a narrow escape. Kentaro reflects on his relationships.

episodes.name: The Way Out
episodes.overview: Cateâ€™s painful memories of G-Day come flooding back as she treks through the ruins of San Francisco with Kentaro and May.

episodes.name: Terrifying Miracles
episodes.overview: Shaw finds an unlikely ally within Monarch as the team has a harrowing run-in. Keiko and Lee grow closer while at a military ball.

episodes.name: Will the Real May Please Stand Up?
episodes.overview: May finally faces her past. Duvall and Shaw follow traces of Godzilla and Hiroshi.

episodes.name: Birthright
episodes.overview: The team goes back to where things all began to confront Shaw. On the brink of collapse, Monarch takes drastic measures.

episodes.name: Axis Mundi
episodes.overview: Shaw and May search for Cate and make a startling discovery. Kentaro struggles with his loss.

episodes.name: Beyond Logic
episodes.overview: The team struggles to find a way out of Axis Mundi. Kentaro and Tim make an unexpected alliance.
